channel.title: Village Resource Information
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Village Resource Information"

item.title: Re: Village Resource Information
item.content:encoded:
Alt - Brilliant Crystals/Solid Fire
Button - Brilliant Crystals/Solid Fire
Deadly - Medicinal Water/Unmelting Ice
DLP - Brilliant Crystals/Unmelting Ice
Dragon - Medicinal Water/Unmelting Ice
Forest - Precious Metals/Solid Fire
Gold - Precious Metals/Solid Fire
Hikari - Brilliant Crystals/Solid Fire
Iglu - Medicinal Water/Unmelting Ice //Tall Walls
Lemon - Precious Metals/Unmelting Ice
Light - Precious Metals/Unmelting Ice
Rasta - Medicinal Water/Solid Fire
Tiger - Precious Metals/Unmelting Ice
The Time - Precious Metals/Unmelting Ice
Tsubasa - Brilliant Crystals/Solid Fire
Volcano - Medicinal Water/Unmelting Ice
Waterfall - Precious Metals/Unmelting Ice

Since I have access to your notes, it only felt right to share mine.

Oh, and of course:
Moon - Brilliant Crystals/Unmelting Ice

item.title: Village Resource Information
item.content:encoded:
I'm going to keep this post updated this time, and delete posts after I've included their information. Difficulty and the like need not be included anymore, since we're nearing the point where we can just bypass all that stuff anyway.
